channel.title: PayPal Currencies
channel.description: i am selling a script, and it will be posted on this site as soon as SB100 gets to it, but with the offers i am getting, they vary with different currencies like GBP and USD, but i am in canada and can only use CAD. does/can PayPal convert the money, or can one paypal account hold different currencies? thanks in advance for the help! much appreciated!

item.title: PayPal Currencies
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

yah paypal converts it.
but they proably offer a bad rate of exchange.

Read full topic

item.description:
@jme wrote:

Yeah it does convert it. I am from Canada too and I have sold/bought many things from different countries.
